掇.definition: to pick up; to collect; to gather up

掇刀.definition: Duodao district of Jingmen city 荊門市|荆门市[Jing1 men2 shi4], Hubei

掇刀區.definition: Duodao district of Jingmen city 荊門市|荆门市[Jing1 men2 shi4], Hubei

掇臀捧屁.definition: to hold up buttocks and praise a fart (idiom); to use flatter to get what one wants; to toady; boot-licking
